name: Lethal Asteroids
description: Lethal Asteroids is a Game where you control a spaceship and you have to avoid the asteroids. It has  3 tacks and you can change between these 3 tracks. In 2 tracks it has asteroids your spaceship gets every time faster and uncontrollable. It has a Retro style but it is a 3d game. The rocket and the rocks are pixel art but the game not.
